tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
@WID@
*multi_to_single_fast5* converts multi read FAST5 file(s) into single read FAST5 files.
**Input**
Multi read file(s) in FAST5 format that are stored in a flat TAR.
**Output**
Single read FAST5 files that are stored in a flat TAR.
